categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith actors

nodes.text: Jett Lucas (born February 7, 1993) is the adopted son of George Lucas. He has cameos in both Attack of the Clones and Revenge of the Sith as a young Jedi Padawan named Zett Jukassa. As a young boy, Jett inspired the name of the Gungan species. Jett is credited as an intern in the video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed. In the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series, the character Ion Papanoida is based on him.
Zett Jukassa is a tuckerization of his name, and the name Jett inspired the last name of Dexter Jettster.[source?]
